rooms.description: Large entrance hall with a reception area and coat closet. The north-facing main entrance aligns with Vastu principles for prosperity.
Open plan living space that flows into the kitchen. Scandinavian design principles emphasize minimalism and natural light.
Integrated dining space within the living area to maintain an open feel.
Functional kitchen with Scandinavian aesthetics including clean lines and a modern layout ensuring Vastu compliance by proper alignment of cooking appliances towards the north side.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom. The room is positioned for optimum natural light and calmness.
Cozy guest bedroom ensuring privacy and good ventilation.
Additional guest bedroom with sufficient space for comfort.
Multipurpose room that can be used as a dressing room or study area. Vastu principles recommend placing this near the entrance for easy access.
Small utility space leading to the rooftop terrace and garden, ensuring smooth transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
